page.title: 04Zeal Monachorum Village Hall
page.content: Zeal Monachorum is fortunate to have a village hall; the local building which once housed the village school, and local groups take full advantage of it to hold their meetings and events. The village Women's Institute meet there every third Wednesday in the month. On every other Wednesday it is the 'club night' for the Adventure Club, the youth group for the village children, aged between eight and eighteen. Another group which meets regularly in the hall, is the Ladies Keep fit group. The village hall is also the venue for the meetings of the Parish Council and, on a less regular basis for other organisations such as Young Farmers. There is no doubt that the village hall is truly essential to village life, and the work of the Village Hall Committee is much appreciated.
